text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr what Y stupid dad done：CDC issued its warning on Jan 8.
Trump held campaign rallies on Jan 9, Jan 14, Jan 28, Jan 30, Feb 10, Feb 19, Feb 20,
golfed on Jan 18, Jan 19, Feb 1, Feb 15, Mar 7 & Mar 8.
first time he admitted the coronavirus might be a problem was Mar 13
